title: Cannot alt tab to session while in full screen
author: onetoomany
body_snippet:
When running my session in full screen mode, and I alt-tab to another app, I can no longer find my current session - I can only alt-tab back to the remoteng application that is showing a white box.  Furthermore, there is only one remoteNG icon on my taskbar.

Workaround is to go to RemoteNG, right click on my session tab, select full screen to return it to the window and full screen again to go full screen.

version 1.76.19.35762
windows 10

iterations.description: When RedirectKeys is enabled, KeyboardHookMode=1 sends Alt+Tab to the remote server, preventing local task switching to the fullscreen RDP session; the fullscreen toolbar or a keyboard hook escape mechanism is needed

notes:
AI triage (claude): When RedirectKeys is enabled, KeyboardHookMode=1 sends Alt+Tab to the remote server, preventing local task switching to the fullscreen RDP session; the fullscreen toolbar or a keyboard hook escape mechanism is needed
Approach: Add handling so that when RDP is in fullscreen mode, either the fullscreen toolbar provides a clickable way to release focus, or implement a configurable keyboard shortcut (e.g. Ctrl+Alt+Break which is standard RDP escape) that toggles fullscreen off, allowing Alt+Tab to work locally. May also need to adjust KeyboardHookMode to mode 2 (hook only in fullscreen) as a user-configurable option.
